argument.name: markerName
argument.description: The name of the marker to emphasize.

argument.name: duration
argument.description: Optional. The duration to bounce the marker specified in milliseconds. The marker will be deemphasized automatically after the specified duration.

page.description: Emphasize (bounce) a marker. If a duration is specified, the marker will automatically be deemphasized after the specified *[js:duration]*.
